item.title: About
item.author: philip.fourie@gmail.com (Philip Fourie)
item.description: Before I forget this stuff (again), I better start writing it down! This blog’s purpose is an exercise to improve my technical writing skills. And if I am lucky, maybe get the chance to help someone else out that is dealing with similar issues. My name is Philip Fourie, and I started writing software when GW-BASIC was what all the cool kids were doing.

item.title: Build an isolated network with Hyper-V for a virtual lab
item.author: philip.fourie@gmail.com (Philip Fourie)
item.description: Occasionally, I need to spin up a few local virtual machines on my Windows 10 laptop to test a networking concept. Building a practical multi-machine configuration can be challenging. For me, this typically means: The VM host can connect to the guest VMs. The guest VMs can connect to the host. The guest VMs can connect to each other.
